original_text: Daniel made a request of the king, and he appointed Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego over the affairs of the province of Babylon. But Daniel remained at the king's court.
korean_text: 왕이 또 다니엘의 요구대로 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 세워 바벨론 지방의 일을 다스리게 하였고 다니엘은 왕궁에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: Daniel made a request of the king
and he appointed Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego
over the affairs of the province of Babylon.
But Daniel remained at the king's court.
